a.title: More information about the accessibility of this site.

p.font: Due to the executive order issued by Texas Governor Abbott, Texhoma ISD will be closed through the 2019-2020 school year. The closure is due to COVID-19.

Due to COVID-19, pre-k round-up will be postponed to a later date. If you have a child who will be a pre-k student during the 2020-2021 school year, please call Mrs. Holguin at 806-827-7411 or e-mail missy.cartwright@texhomaisd.net to be put on a list to receive information about pre-k round-up when it becomes available.

h3.a: Parent Survey-Meal Needs from April 20-End of Year

div.p:
We will use last weeks Grab and Go survey (April 14-17) for the remainder of the year. If you need added to this list please fill out the the meal survey anytime prior to the end of the year.
Meal Survey through End of Year

div.p:
AT-HOME LEARNING
While the district is closed, in an effort to protect our community from the spread of COVID-19, we expect our students to continue learning at home with the remote support of our teachers and support personnel.
Students will receive direct communication and instruction from their teachers.
Students will return all completed lessons to the campus on Fridays and receive the next weeks lessons. Staff will be available for pick-up and dropping off of materials from 7am to 7pm. Please come during this time or make other arrangements with a staff member.
Teachers are . . .
